channel.title: Yellowstone County|Montana|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Yellowstone County|Montana|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 434
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 434 - US-212/US-310/Laurel/Red Lodge. US-212 west leaves I-90 westbound here. Eastbound US-212 east joins I-90 to Crow Agency. This is the northern terminus of US-310.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 434
item.description: I-90 west approaching Exit 434 - US-212/US-310/Red Lodge/Laurel.

item.title: Begin BL-90 West at I-90 West
item.description: Begin BL-90 West at I-90 West to Butte (first left). Use second left for BL-90 to East Laurel.

item.title: End BL-90 East at South Frontage Road and I-90 East
item.description: End BL-90 East at South Frontage Road and I-90 East to Billings.

item.title: I-90 West - Yellowstone River / Entering Billings
item.description: I-90 west at the Yellowstone River. Entering Billings. Billings is the largest city in Montana and the county seat of Yellowstone County.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 452
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 452 - BL-90/US-87 North/Lockwood/Roundup. US-87 north leaves I-90 westbound here.

item.title: I-90 West at I-94 East - Yellowstone County
item.description: I-90 West at Exit 456 - I-94 East/Bismarck (North Dakota). Continue west on I-90 for Billings. This is the western terminus of I-94.

item.title: Frontage Road at I-94 (Exit 23)
item.description: Frontage Road at I-94 junction. Turn left for the community of Pompeys Pillar. Turn right for I-94 west to Billings; continue over freeway for I-94 east to Miles City.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 23
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 23 - Pompeys Pillar. Pompeys Pillar is a sandstone outcrop, that is special because it has a signature of William Clark, from the Lewis and Clark expedition engraved in it. William Clark named Pompeys Pillar after Sacagawea’s infant son Jean Baptiste, whom Clark had nicknamed Pompey.

item.description: First I-94 shield on I-94 eastbound.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 456 - I-94 Jct.
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 456 - I-94 East/Bismarck (North Dakota). Merge right to continue east on I-90 to Sheridan (Wyoming). This is the beginning of I-94. The eastern end of I-94 is the Canadian border at Port Huron, Michigan.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 455 and 456
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 455 - Johnson Lane, 1 mile. Approaching Exit 456 - I-94 East/Miles City/Bismarck (North Dakota).

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 452
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 452 - US-87 North/Lockwood/Roundup. US-87 south joins I-90 east to Sheridan, Wyoming. This is the eastern end of the Billings business loop.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 450
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 450 - MT-3/27th St. MT-3 connects Billings with Great Falls, Montana.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 434
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 434 - US-310/US-212/Red Lodge/Laurel. This is the northern terminus of US-310, which beings near Greybull, Wyoming. US-212 joins I-90 east to Crow Agency.

item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 433 - BL-90/Laurel. This is the west end of the Laurel business loop.
